sub_title: Legal & Public Policy Professional | Policy Analysis & Strategy Formulation | Stakeholder Management | Project Management | Partnership Building
summary:
A legal & public policy professional with 6+ years of experience analysing public policy and legal developments and proposing recommendations to clients. 

Skilled in providing legal and policy advice to government and private organisations and developing and implementing strategies. 

Demonstrated excellence in coordinating with stakeholders, reviewing, developing, and implementing policies and strategies for their assigned projects. 

I have extensive experience working in a multicultural environment, including teams across Germany, Australia, the USA, Switzerland, Africa, and India.

A proactive individual with excellent prospecting, relationship building, and presentation skills across a diverse clientele. 

Bold and creative defines me; the Commonwealth, UK invited me as an Indian legal professional to discuss the possibilities of setting up a youth network of legal professionals for the commonwealth countries.

With the ability to foresee the bigger picture, I prepared the agenda plan and have contributed to setting up the NGO & Partnerships Division under the guidance of the Founder to initiate projects with NGOs & other stakeholders on Sustainable Development Goals 2030.

My collaborative attitude made me liaise with lawyers and solicitors to handle critical legal matters about civil laws, including cases before the Supreme Court of India and the Delhi High Court.

I also got selected as the only Indian to represent the specialisation of foreign policy out of a batch of 140 students to feature in an exclusive video made for the specialization, which is now available on YouTube and the website of United Nations University, Maastricht, Netherlands.

Found it interesting, feel free to connect at arushi.tangri12@gmail.com

education.degree_name: Master of Science (MSc) Public Policy & Human Development
Master of Science (MSc.) Public Policy & Human Development

certifications.name: Gender Matters (PTP.2022.16E)
certifications.authority: United Nations Institute for Training and Research (UNITAR)

company.name: United Nations Institute for Training and Research (UNITAR)

profile_positions.description:
•  Led the NGO division for ConnectAID to bring International NGOs and foundations on board to work  
   for the Sustainable Development Goals, 2030 (SDGs).
 
•  Carried planning and conducted events such as workshops, mentorship and capacity-building training 
   for the NGOs, foundations and their partners working for the SDGs.
 
•  Successfully Implemented the India Mission in Aug 2022. We raised 2500 Euros under crowdfunding 
   for the partner NGO where money will be used for education, self-employment & sanitation facilities 
   for children and women from the weaker sections of society.
 
•  Conducted interviews with street children who are a survivor of drug abuse and domestic violence.
profile_positions.title: Partnerships Officer for NGOs & Partnerships Division

profile_positions.description:
•  Carried a landscape analysis and provided recommendations on possible interventions after analysing 
   the policies and data collected on extreme poverty in Ethiopia for a project for BRAC USA

•  I strategized and planned operations for the organisation to open two new offices in Africa. Liaised 
  with UN organisations under different projects and ensured timely completion of projects. 

•  Handled six members under legal and vetting teams and ensured their timely completion of work. 
   Conducted the data collection (key informant interviews and focus group discussions) for one of the 
   Impact Evaluation projects for an international organisation in Northeast India. 

• Started the governance and social protection node under the guidance of the Research Director to 
  initiate projects and activities on governance and social protection issues like poverty, women's rights, 
  and child rights; prepared the concept note and agenda plan for the Node. 

•  Drafted policies such as child safeguarding and welfare, sexual harassment, workplace bullying and 
   harassment, disability and social media.
profile_positions.title: Legal & Public Policy Officer

profile_positions.description:
•  As an Expert Faculty, I was invited to create a lecture series curriculum on Public Policy and 
   Governance focusing on India, Its Foreign Policy, and its position globally.

•  I delivered the lectures through video content soon to be published on YouTube as lecture series.
profile_positions.title: Expert Faculty on Public Policy & Governance

company.name: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH

profile_positions.company: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH
profile_positions.description:
•  I facilitated an Idea Startup Challenge event which spanned 3+ months, organised by the Ministry of 
   MSME & HRD & supported by GIZ. Organized Green Recovery Ecosystem Builder (GREB) Programme 
   implemented by GIZ in partnership with Ministry of MSME, Government of India and Adelphi. 

•  Identified small-scale independent organizations across the Northern Region in India that support 
   businesses and entrepreneurs involved in building products and solutions to mitigate the impact of 
   COVID-19 and helped them secure direct funding under the project. 

•  Represented GIZ under the project in startup pitch events, webinars and mentorship programmes and 
   discussed possible synergies for collaboration with other stakeholders. 

• Facilitated an Indo - German startup tour by partnering with international stakeholders such as CEFE 
  International German Indian Startup Exchange Programme to provide a platform for Indian startups 
  and incubators to identify possible synergies and areas of cooperation with their German counterparts.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

company.name: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH

profile_positions.company: Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ) GmbH
profile_positions.description:
•  Provided support in working with the Ministry of MSME & Ministry of HRD and industry stakeholders, 
   India, concerning ongoing projects to boost the startup ecosystem in India  

•  Assisted in developing strategies & policy proposals along with making action plans, policy reports & 
   tender proposals for  partners  

•  Assisted in organising & coordinating events with stakeholders across Punjab & Maharashtra region 
   to boost the startup and  entrepreneurial ecosystem in India under the Incubation Vertical  

•  Maintained the database management systems for the project to monitor the deliverables under the 
   incubation vertical  along with supporting communication activities
profile_positions.title: Internship

company.name: Indian National Association of Legal Professionals (INALP) [भारतीय राष्ट्रीय विधिक वृत्तिक संस्था]®

profile_positions.company: Indian National Association of Legal Professionals (INALP) [भारतीय राष्ट्रीय विधिक वृत्तिक संस्था]®
profile_positions.description:
•  As Advisor, led Research and Development team and provided consultancy services to clients on 
   International Trade Policy & Law, Intellectual Property Rights, and Human Rights Law. 

•  Mentored & Coached young lawyers & legal professionals on important subjects of law, career 
   guidance etc. 

•  Organised a trade conference with International Law Institute, the USA, for legal professionals and 
   students. Invited to be a guest speaker on behalf of INALP on a webinar hosted by a law college on 
   "Rise of Unilateralism in a Multilateral World."
profile_positions.title: Deputy Director & Advisor

company.name: Chambers of Senior Advocate Puneet Mittal

profile_positions.company: Chambers of Senior Advocate Puneet Mittal
profile_positions.description:
•  Formulated trial techniques specifically about each case, explained available courses of action & possible repercussions of cases to clients and argued 60-70 cases per month in civil courts on subject matter such as women and child rights, intellectual property rights, information technology law, education law and Constitutional law. 

•  Performed legal research and worked with stakeholders to develop strategies & arguments in 
   preparation for the presentation of cases. 

• Advised clients to settle cases instead of protracted litigation. Drafted suits, applications, case briefs, 
   and contracts under different subject matters of civil laws.
profile_positions.title: Associate Advocate

profile_positions.description:
•  Carried on research based on various law propositions under the Indian Penal Code, Court Fees Act, 
   Delhi, Rent Control Act, SARFAESI Act, Arbitration and Conciliation Act etc., along with preparing case 
   briefs

•   Attended court cases with seniors at the High Court of Delhi & District Courts of Delhi
profile_positions.title: Legal Internship

profile_positions.description:
•  Carried on research based on law propositions under the Corporate Law, Arbitration Law, Intellectual
   Property Rights etc.

•  Assisted in making opinions on corporate law cases presented in front of the client and trademark 
   reports

•  Wrote an article on Public & Private Partnerships

•  Prepared and presented a PowerPoint presentation on Data privacy & Protection to the Corporate 
   team at the office
profile_positions.title: Legal Internship

profile_positions.description:
•  Carried on research based on law propositions under the Indian Trademarks and Copyrights Act

•  Assisted in finding evidence for client’s trademarks along with proofreading, drafting evidence 
   for the trademarks

•  Prepared case summaries on case laws in trademark & Copyright and assisted seniors in case 
   preparation

•  Wrote an article on Fashion and Intellectual Property Law
profile_positions.title: Legal Internship

volunteer_experiences.role: Legal and Mental Health Support Advisor
volunteer_experiences.description: I support the Dutch Refugee Council in the Netherlands which currently works for providing support to the Ukranian Refugees. I provide voluntary service once a week in legal and mental health support to the refugees in Leiden.
